alert.note: Alert for Delta (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 08 at 3:02PM EDT until July 08 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM EDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL DELTA COUNTY... At 302 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near U.S. 41 between Trenary and Rapid River, or 22 miles north of Escanaba, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Rock and U.S. 41 between Trenary and Rapid River. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
